item.description:
Join us as we revive this Meetup to discuss mobile software development. The focus of this group has been broadened beyond Android to cover all mobile platforms, with a focus on the smartphones (Android, iPhone, Blackberry, etc.).

Kingston Station is 2 minutes from Downtown Crossing station, and there is also street and garage parking nearby. We have their private room reserved for the night and free wifi is available.

AGENDA
1. Introductions (~15 mins)
2. Business Models (~30 mins)
- Paid vs. free apps
- Leveraging app stores
- Future platforms
3. Porting apps across platforms (~30 mins)
- Technology comparison
- Platform limitations
- Dev time/costs by platform
4. App development questions/issues (~45 mins)
- Location based services/browsers
- Graphics and sound
- Accessing web services
5. Networking
item.how_to_find_us: Private room at the back of the restaurant
item.name: Revival of the Mobile Software Developers Meetup
